mapper.insert: insert into chick_review (goodsId, memberId, reviewContents) values (#{goodsId}, #{memberId}, #{reviewContents})
mapper.select: select * from chick_review where goodsId=#{goodsId} order by id desc
mapper.update: update chick_review set reviewContents=#{reviewContents} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into chick_reviewHits (reviewId, memberId, reviewHits) values (#{reviewId}, #{memberId}, 1)
mapper.update: update chick_review set reviewHits=(select count(id) from chick_reviewHits where reviewId=#{reviewId}) where id=#{id}
update chick_reviewHits set reviewHits=reviewHits-1 where id=#{id} and reviewId=#{reviewId} and memberId=#{memberId}
